description.narrative: The project will support the ongoing transition of smallholder livestock farming from subsistence to be commercialized and integrated into livestock value chains (LVCs) to meet domestic and increasing international market demands for good quality Lao meat products.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased livestock sales from sustainable smallholder production in the project areas.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
50% of fresh pork and beef available in Luang Prabang and Phonsavanh (Xienkhoung) towns butchered at HACCP-certified facilities (baseline 2014: 0%)

description.narrative: Increased livestock sales from sustainable smallholder production in the project areas.

title.narrative: On average, SLPMG members sell heavier live animals: pigs: 55 kg (baseline 2014: 45 kg) and cattle: 225 kg (baseline 2014: 200 kg); and sell more animals with increased annual sales of pigs: 18 (baseline 2014: 12) and cattle: 5 (baseline 2014: 3)

description.narrative: Increased livestock sales from sustainable smallholder production in the project areas.
